exercises.title: Complex Trigonometric Analysis
exercises.description: Analyze complex trigonometric functions and advanced concepts.

tasks.title: Fourier Transform Calculator
tasks.question:
Implement a basic Fourier Transform calculator for trigonometric functions.

Your calculator should:

  • Calculate Fourier coefficients for periodic functions
  • Perform discrete Fourier transform
  • Handle complex exponential form
  • Calculate power spectrum
  • Provide frequency domain analysis
tasks.hint: Use FFT algorithm, calculate coefficients using integration, handle complex numbers
tasks.output: Fourier coefficients: a₁=0, b₁=1, a₃=0, b₃=0.5

tasks.title: Fourier Series Properties
tasks.question:
What is the fundamental frequency of a Fourier series with period T?

Consider: Relationship between period and fundamental frequency
tasks.hint: Fundamental frequency is the inverse of the period

tasks.title: Complex Trigonometric Functions
tasks.question:
Create a calculator for complex trigonometric functions.

Your calculator should:

  • Calculate sin(z), cos(z) for complex z
  • Use Euler's formula e^(iz) = cos(z) + isin(z)
  • Handle complex exponentials
  • Calculate complex roots of unity
  • Provide magnitude and phase information
tasks.hint: Use Euler's formula, separate real and imaginary parts, calculate magnitude and phase

exercises.title: Advanced Trigonometric Applications
exercises.description: Apply advanced trigonometry to complex real-world problems.

tasks.title: Spherical Trigonometry Calculator
tasks.question:
Implement a spherical trigonometry calculator for navigation.

Your calculator should:

  • Calculate great circle distances
  • Solve spherical triangles
  • Use spherical law of cosines and sines
  • Handle navigation problems
  • Convert between coordinate systems
tasks.hint: Use spherical law of cosines: cos(c) = cos(a)cos(b) + sin(a)sin(b)cos(C)

tasks.title: Spherical Trigonometry
tasks.question:
What is the spherical law of cosines used for?

Consider: Applications in spherical geometry
tasks.hint: Think about calculating distances and angles on a sphere

tasks.title: Signal Processing Calculator
tasks.question:
Create a signal processing calculator using trigonometric functions.

Your calculator should:

  • Generate sinusoidal signals with different frequencies
  • Calculate signal power and energy
  • Perform amplitude and phase modulation
  • Handle signal filtering
  • Analyze signal spectra
tasks.hint: Use trigonometric functions for signal generation, calculate RMS values, apply modulation
tasks.input: Signal: A*sin(2πft + φ), A=5, f=100Hz, φ=π/4
